description.text: §9Resets skill tree, all abilities (also [Explorer] abilties) and refunds points.

root_champion.title: §6Class:§f Champion
root_champion.extra_description:
§f§oTake up the mantle of a §b§oBeastmaster§f§o, empowering your tamed companions while enduring the brunt of enemy attacks.

Your pets do most of the heavy lifting in battle.

root_rogue.title: §6Class:§f Rogue

description.text:
§a+8%§f Attack Damage
§a+8%§f Attack Speed
§a+5%§f Movement Speed

root_rogue.extra_description:
§f§oA rather offensive strategist relying heavily on dodging attacks while also being granted agility in every way possible.

Knowing his enemies weak spots, heavy armored mobs are no problem for this class.

root_paladin.title: §6Class:§f Paradox

description.text:
§a+10%§f Magical Damage
§a+0.25§f Extra Magic Damage
§a+0.75%§f Life Steal

root_paladin.extra_description: §f§oReliant on the ability to deal magic damage, as well as ice and fire damage, this class also syphons away at the enemies health, healing you in the process.

root_sickle.title: §6Class:§f Sickle

description.text:
§a+10%§f Crit Damage
§a+0.25%§f Current HP Damage
§a+2.5%§f Overheal

root_sickle.extra_description: §f§oA ruthless striker who excels at landing critical hits, dealing damage based on enemy health, and sustaining through overheal.

root_ranger.title: §6Class:§f Ranger

description.text:
§a+8%§f Ranged Damage
§a+12%§f Arrow Damage
§a+10%§f Draw Speed

root_ranger.extra_description: §f§oA ranged specialist excelling in ranged damage, velocity and draw speed, best played cautiously due to low defense.

description.text:
§fDeal §a+30%§f attack damage.
On hit, §a(0.5% × Lv)§f chance to stun yourself.

Cannot retrigger during cooldown.
§9Cooldown: (5s × Lv)§f

§fOn hit, §a(+4% × Lv)§f chance to summon a §bHoming Magic Missile§f dealing §dMagic Damage§f, which seeks out nearby enemies.
§9Cooldown: 5s§f

§fOn projectile hit, summon a barrage of §a(10 × Lv)§f §bDark Arrows§f dealing §a3§f base damage scaling with your §bCoefficient§f.

While at §bfull health§f, deal §adouble damage§f.

If §bunarmored§f, the barrage focuses on the target; otherwise the arrows rain in a wider spread.
§9Cooldown: 40s§f

§fBeing attacked by a mob has a §b33%§f chance to spawn §a(+1 × Lv)§f temporary shield, blocking any amount of damage once.

If successful the ability goes on cooldown.

§f] to amp your next strike, dealing §a(+25% × Lv)§f damage
